verbs.description: The separation of children from parents by the Trump Administration — especially when that [V: is] followed by deportation of the parents without the children — is probably not the result of incompetence , and is more likely a deliberate policy , a tool of war . ...

The separation of children from parents by the Trump Administration — especially [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG1: that] is [V: followed] [ARG0: by deportation of the parents without the children] — is probably not the result of incompetence , and is more likely a deliberate policy , a tool of war . ...

[ARG1: The separation of children from parents by the Trump Administration — especially when that is followed by deportation of the parents without the children —] [V: is] [ARGM-ADV: probably] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: the result of incompetence] , and is more likely a deliberate policy , a tool of war . ...
